channel.title: db on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in db on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Today worked on AB DB
item.description: ##22:32 Monday 16 February 2015 JST## AB DB primarily consists of two big tables. Table U has 77k records, and 160 columns. Table B has maybe 40k records and maybe 70 columns. There’s a 1-to-many relationship from B to U. Doing joins on them takes about 3 or 4 seconds. That ain’t good, considering the joins are done all the frickin time. I guess that’s why when I got the original data, a lot of what’s now in the B table was in the U table.
